House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00112
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE RIGHT OF CITIZENS TO INFORMATION HELD BY THE GOVERNMENT
SHORT TITLE : People’s Freedom Of Information Act
ABSTRACT : Declares it a State policy to recognize the right of the people to information on matters of public concern, and adopts and implements a policy of full public disclosure of all its transactions involving public interest.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BAGUILAT, TEDDY JR. BRAWNER
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
